channel.title: CVE Feed for Digital Arts Inc. -- i-FILTER, i-FILTER Browser & Cloud MultiAgent for Windows, and D-SPA using i-FILTER
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Digital Arts Inc. -- i-FILTER, i-FILTER Browser & Cloud MultiAgent for Windows, and D-SPA using i-FILTER

item.title: CVE-2022-21170|2024-08-03T02:31:59.738Z -- digital%20arts%20inc. -- i-filter%2C%20i-filter%20browser%20%26%20cloud%20multiagent%20for%20windows%2C%20and%20d-spa%20using%20i-filter
item.description: Improper check for certificate revocation in i-FILTER Ver.10.45R01 and earlier, i-FILTER Ver.9.50R10 and earlier, i-FILTER Browser & Cloud MultiAgent for Windows Ver.4.93R04 and earlier, and D-SPA (Ver.3 / Ver.4) using i-FILTER allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to conduct a man-in-the-middle attack and eavesdrop on an encrypted communication.
